thread.title_full: Peru’s first year at Grand Rapids Latin American Film FestivalTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Peru’s first year at Grand Rapids Latin American Film FestivalTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Peru’s first year at Grand Rapids Latin American Film Festival Published on : Saturday, September 5, 2015
The Grand Rapids Latin American Film Festival will see the participation of Peru this year. This will be Peru’s first year at the Film Festival which will be held in the said Michigan State’s city on September 17-20, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Peru announced.
National productions, such as Pirates in Callao by Eduardo Schuldt, Ella by Francisco Lombardi and La Vigilia (The Vigil) by Augusto Tamayo, will be screened at the event.
These are aimed at spreading Peruvian cinematographic culture in overseas.
Screenings will be made possible thanks to efforts undertaken by the Chancellery’s Directorate of Cultural Affairs and the Consulate-General of Peru in Chicago (Il).
